Description: Foot (with concave edge) with turn of stem of Attic black-glazed pottery cup, type C; concave edge to foot and offset at base of stem; glazed black (peeled) on top and underside; reserved: outer face of foot and resting surface; inscription cut on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 505)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1662)
